title: Rüdigenspitze
text: The Rüdigenspitze is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Gastlosen">Gastlosen</a>, located on the border between the Swiss cantons of <a href="Canton%20of%20Fribourg">Fribourg</a> and <a href="Canton%20of%20Bern">Bern</a>. It lies south of <a href="Jaun">Jaun</a>.
